channel.title: Stackstorm sensor on docker-compose not able to install
channel.description: I have installed stackstorm on docker-compose. And I am trying to setup a sensor that polls a unix folder. I am able to create a shared folder that is shared within the docker and outside. But somehow when i install the docker the rule says missing trigger. The sensor will not be installed . Not sure how to proceed

item.title: Stackstorm sensor on docker-compose not able to install
item.dc:creator: sp4
item.description:
I have installed stackstorm on docker-compose. And I am trying to setup a sensor that polls a unix folder. I am able to create a shared folder that is shared within the docker and outside. But somehow when i install the docker the rule says missing trigger. The sensor will not be installed . Not sure how to proceed

Read full topic
